line_1: WHILE sickness, madam, on your vitals prey'd,
line_2: I mark'd them then in sable weeds array'd,

line_1: And o'er the mangled corse relentless prey'd.
line_2: And swift descending to the deepest shade,

line_1: His Heat intense, and on his Vitals prey'd;
line_2: But either there the scorching Sun display'd

line_1: No Care destroy'd, no sick Disorder prey'd,
line_2: No bending Age his sprightly Form decay'd,

line_1: On his own wretched Kind he, ruthless, prey'd;
line_2: In every Country mighty Robbers sway'd,

line_1: On his own wretched Kind he, ruthless, prey'd;
line_2: And Guile and ruffian Force were all their Trade.
